item.description:
Since Jaffrey closes at dark, we should be back in plenty of time to have a quick discussion about the International Learn to Fly day on May 15th.

After your bird is tucked in for the night, please meet me over at Bullock's Hangar.

Agenda


  • Go over previous action items
  • Decide what we want to do about Food
  • I can show the first 20 min of the web cast that we missed
  • Decide how many people we need

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: LTF Day planning meeting
